de.fu.weave.xml
Class XmlWriter

java.lang.Object
  de.fu.weave.xml.XmlWriter

public class XmlWriter
extends java.lang.Object

Utiliy for writing XML.

XMLWriter writes an XML-Source (e.g. a Document) represented in memory into a stream-based object (a file, a String, ...). Currently only writing to a PrintWriter is supported.

Please not that this XMLWriter is not suitable for writing XMLSchema or XSLT-Stylesheet, since it changes the prefixes of namespaces and

Since:
Iteration2
Author:
Julian Fleischer

namespaces

private final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> namespaces
This map holds the prefix table, a mapping from namespace-uri to prefix

Since this is an XMLWriter we are interested in looking up prefixes by namespace, not the other way around as one might expect

Since:
Iteration2

findNamespaces

private void findNamespaces(org.w3c.dom.Element element)
Gather all namespaces used in an Element and its children

If a new namespace is found it is inserted to the prefix-table using createNamespace(String).

Parameters:
element - The element to be scanned
Since:

Gather all namespaces used in a List of Attributes
